name: Jukebox
description: A simple song manager for Geometry Dash

issues.info: For any issues regarding this mod, send me a message on my discord: 'fleeym'. If you can, please give the level or song ID you are having problems with.

store-mashups.name: Store Mashups
store-mashups.description: Allows mashups to be downloaded from Song File Hub

fix-empty-size.name: Fix 0.0B
fix-empty-size.description: Fixes multi asset levels showing 0.0B size (experimental, might cause lag when downloading assets)
